text.new: Theme changed. You must restart your desktop for the changes to become active.

text.old: The vfs service is the layer that must be used to manipulate any file inside oneye. It contains two sets of functions to manipulate files: one to work with the user's personal (virtual) files, and the other one (having always a 'real_' prefix on their name) to work with normal (real) files.
text.new: The vfs service is the layer that must be used to manipulate any file inside oneye. It contains two sets of functions to manipulate files: one to work with the user's personal (virtual) files, and the other one (having always a 'real_' prefix on their name) to work with normal (real) files.

text.new: Sorry, this page is not installed.

text.new: The chosen group is already the default group!

text.old: The extern service is used to load resources such as images or CSS files from the extern directory. These resources can then be used by applications within oneye.
text.new: The extern service is used to load resources such as images or CSS files from the extern directory. These resources can then be used by applications within oneye.

text.old: The eyeX service is responsible for drawing the contents of the page and the manipulation of CSS and JS files. It is also responsible for the control of the layer system, part of which is the 'eyeApps' layer, in which all the applications and the desktop are drawn.
text.new: The eyeX service is responsible for drawing the contents of the page and the manipulation of CSS and JS files. It is also responsible for the control of the layer system, part of which is the 'eyeApps' layer, in which all the applications and the desktop are drawn.

text.old: The mmap service is a key part of the oneye system that connects the client side with the server side via message passing between the two parts. The messages always consist in an XML string giving instructions of the actions to perform to the part.
text.new: The mmap service is a key part of the oneye system that connects the client side with the server side via message passing between the two parts. The messages always consist in an XML string giving instructions of the actions to perform to the part.

text.old: The proc service gives the possibility to manage and get information about running processes.
text.new: The proc service gives the possibility to manage and get information about running processes.
